item.title: Radio Compass (ADF) Systems – Installed by E.O. B757-3450-12120-A

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided proposed route of flight, primary and alternate approach facilities do not require its use, and

numlitem.para: Both VOR receivers are operative, and
VOR navigation aids are available along the route of flight and can be used to proceed to a suitable alternate.

note.para: ADF is not required unless en route or approach navigation is predicated upon its use.

placard.para: Placard near Left or Right ADF Control Panel "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
